org.eclipse.incquery.runtime.rete.construction

Interface IRetePatternBuilder<PatternDescription,StubHandle,Collector>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EPMBuilder

    public interface IRetePatternBuilder<PatternDescription,StubHandle,Collector>
    Exchangeable component of ReteEngine, responsible for building pattern matcher rete subnets.
    Author:
    Gabor Bergmann

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collector construct(PatternDescription gtPattern)
      Builds a part of the rete network that will match occurences of a given pattern.
      IPatternMatcherContext<PatternDescription> getContext()
      Returns the context associated with this builder.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Integer> getPosMapping(PatternDescription gtPattern)
      Extract the position mapping of the graph pattern.
      void refresh()
      After the ReteEngine is reinitialized, the pattern builder has to be notified about the change.

    • Method Detail

      • construct

        Collector construct(PatternDescription gtPattern)
                    throws RetePatternBuildException
        Builds a part of the rete network that will match occurences of a given pattern.
        Parameters:
        gtPattern - the pattern whose matcher subnet has to be built.
        Returns:
        production. the Production node that should store matchings of the given pattern.
        Throws:
        RetePatternBuildException - if construction fails.

      • getPosMapping

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Integer> getPosMapping(PatternDescription gtPattern)
        Extract the position mapping of the graph pattern.

      • getContext

        IPatternMatcherContext<PatternDescription> getContext()
        Returns the context associated with this builder.

      • refresh

        void refresh()
        After the ReteEngine is reinitialized, the pattern builder has to be notified about the change.
